## Collider.enableCollisionEvents() method

Enables or disables collision events for the collider. This is automatically enabled if an on collision callback is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableCollisionEvents(enabled: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

enabled


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Whether collision events are enabled.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
